app.name: Custom Objects Manager
app.short_description: Manage and edit custom objects directly from Zendesk
app.long_description: A modern and intuitive application to manage and edit Custom Objects records directly from the Zendesk Support navigation bar.
app.installation_instructions: Please configure the API names of the Custom Objects you want to display in the app settings.

custom_objects_to_display.label: Custom Objects to Display
custom_objects_to_display.helpText: Enter the API names of the Custom Objects you want to display, separated by comma or line. Example: object_a, object_b, object_c
